title: Restoring Your Marriage After Infidelity, Part 8
itunes:author: Gary and Mona Shriver
itunes:summary: Infidelity can deal a crushing blow to your marriage. It devastates the trust you once had. But through God's grace, an affair doesn't have to be the end of your marriage. Greg, Erin and John offer hope to couples who've been traumatized by an affair. Receive the book Unfaithful with your gift of any amount!
